channel.title: Need help with logging into server!
channel.description: Okay, I am hosting a server and when I try to log into my server i get a message saying "error connecting to server". But when my friend tries connecting to the server he can log in just fine, what should i do?

item.title: Need help with logging into server!
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Okay you have to log into the server with local host or with no ip or 127.0.0.1 no with the server ip and then it should work

  • Tension Ltd

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with logging into server!
